content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore pump (position z)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory for necessary resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities in the target area.

### Errors related to insufficient resources for structures
- Regularly check your inventory and resource availability to avoid attempting to build or craft without the necessary materials.
